The stock's bid property name.

The size of the stock's bid property name.

BUY_STOCK_ACTION - Static variable in class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.controller.StockMarketController
The action command for buying shares of a stock.
BUY_STOCK_DIALOG_ACTION - Static variable in class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.controller.StockMarketController
The action command for displaying the buy stock dialog.
BuyDialog - Class in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog
A dialog for the buy stock transaction.
BuyDialog() - Constructor for class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog.BuyDialog
Create a new non-modal buy dialog, with no owner.
BuyDialog(Frame) - Constructor for class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog.BuyDialog
Create a new non-modal buy dialog with the specified container as its owner.
BuyDialog(Frame, boolean) - Constructor for class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog.BuyDialog
Create a new buy dialog with the specified container as its owner, and its modality specified.
BuySellPanel - Class in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui
A GUI panel with the controls for buying and selling stocks on it.
BuySellPanel() - Constructor for class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.BuySellPanel
Create the panel.
buyStock(Object) - Method in class io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.controller.StockMarketController
Purchase shares of the selected stock, based on the value provided from the view.
